name: clannishly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is friendly and helpful only to other people in your group, but not to people outside the group: Students clung together clannishly in their little groups. They clannishly "look after their own." See
clannish
More examplesFewer examplesThey live clannishly within their own groups.Napoleon behaved clannishly and gave his family important posts.They have a clannishly narrow interpretation of what being southern means.
